description: validation of the Jupyter Notebook document level metadata for ipypublish

___language.description: the language can be any specified in the babel package

___titlepage.description: options for creating the title page

___logo.description: the path to the logo image file  (absolute or relative)

___latex.description: settings specific to outputting a latex document

___no_glossary.description: suppress the `\printglossary` command(s) that will be output at the end of the file (if bibglossary set)

___bibliography.description: the path to the bibliography bibtex file (absolute or relative)

___depth.description: the depth of subheaders to show

___biboptions.description: a list of options to parse to natbib

___pandoc.description: settings for running the ipypandoc filters, to convert markdown to other formats

___hide_raw.description: if the extracted non-markdown does not match the output format, this controls if it is shown in the output document

___apply_filters.description: whether to apply filters to markdown

___reftag.description: in latex, default tag for citations

___use_numref.description: in rst, whether to use the ``:numref:`` role or just ``:ref:``

___at_notation.description: interpret +@label as a reference type based on its prefix modifier

___convert_raw.description: attempt to extract non-markdown formats and convert them to the target format, e.g. rst roles to latex tags

___bibstyle.description: a natbib stylename, to control the output style of the bibliography

___sphinx.description: settings specific to outputting a sphinx document

___no_glossary.description: suppress the `.. bibglossary::` directive that will be output at the end of the file (if bibglossary set)

___toggle_output.description: add toggle buttons to the right of all nboutput cells, to hide/show their content

___toggle_output_all.description: add a toggle button at the top of the top of the document (using `:toggle-output-all:`), which will show/hide all nboutput cell's content

___toggle_input_all.description: add a toggle button at the top of the top of the document (using `:toggle-input-all:`), which will show/hide all nbinput cell's content

___toggle_input.description: add toggle buttons to the right of all nbinput cells, to hide/show their content

___no_bib.description: suppress the `.. bibliography::` directive that will be output at the end of the file (if bibliography set)

___orphan.description: whether the :orphan: directive is added to the top of the file (to suppress warnings if it is not included in a toc tree)

___bibglossary.description: option for a glossary, controlled by a custom bibtex file

___style_acronyms.description: style of the output acronym glossary

___style_symbols.description: style of the output symbols glossary

___filepath.description: path to the bibtex file (absolute or relative)
